title: Ticket #300: HAD replication service exits immediately w/ status 0
description:
At Fermi their master log is full of the following: 

3/4 14:12:07 Started process
"/grid/condorsleeper_sl5/sbin/condor_replication", pid and pgroup = 24854
3/4 14:12:07 The REPLICATION (pid 24854) exited with status 0
3/4 14:12:07 restarting /grid/condorsleeper_sl5/sbin/condor_replication in
137 seconds

Perhaps we should start running the replication service on UW production pools to gain more first-hand experience w/ this service (which was contributed by Technion).
remarks: This was caused by REPLICATION not being in the DC_DAEMON_LIST. The default DC_DAEMON_LIST has been fixed, as well as the sample configuration.
